Html:
Hi,
Im developing custom datagrid in wpf.I could able to work with custom datagrid .My custom control is having generic.xaml which has template as datagrid .with Auto genrated columns = true

My Question is how can i have columns in custom datagrid.I could able to get customgridview.columns and within columns ,I added datagridTextcolumn ,It is not rendering gridview with textcolumn,.i also  made Auto genrated columns = false

In short ,How can have different types of columns like comboboxcolumn,checkboxcolumn,textbox column within Custom Datagrid.I could not able to generate columns 


With Regards,
Mahender
